newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 23.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 23.

text.p: * DuPont Co is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $1.58, compared to $1.26 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 97-1/4 on Tuesday.
* Praxair Inc reported third quarter earnings per share of $0.54, compared to $0.44 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.52. The stock closed at 46-1/8.
* American Electric Power is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.83, compared to $0.93 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 40-5/8.
* USF&G Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.21, compared to $0.33 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 18-1/2.
* Sunbeam Corp is expected to report a third quarter loss of $0.10 a share, compared to a profit of $0.11 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 24-3/4.
* Tambrands Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.61, compared to $0.73 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 43.
* U S West Communications Group is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.60, compared to $0.59 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 30-1/2.
* AlliedSignal Inc reported third quarter earnings of $0.90 a share, compared to $0.77 a year ago. Third quarter net was in line with the First Call estimate. The stock closed at 64-3/4.
* United Technologies Corp reported third quarter earnings per share of $1.94, compared to $1.60 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $1.87. The stock closed at 125-5/8.
* Dean Witter Discover & Co reported third quarter earnings per diluted share of $1.41, compared to $1.23 last year. The First Call estimate was $1.36. The stock closed at 58-5/8.
